name: Elden Ring

rules: Create and manage your farm, build relationships with townspeople, and explore the countryside.
how_to_play: Plant crops, raise animals, and explore caves to mine resources and defeat monsters.

additional_information.notable_features: Charming farming simulator with social and adventure elements.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
rules: Explore a massive open-world, engage in shootouts, and live as an outlaw in the wild west.
how_to_play: Complete story missions, engage in side activities, and make moral decisions that affect the world.

additional_information.notable_features: Immersive open-world with detailed environments and storyline.

name: GTA V
rules: Live the life of criminals in Los Santos, completing heists and missions while evading the law.
how_to_play: Switch between three protagonists, engage in missions, explore the open world, and complete various side activities.

additional_information.notable_features: Multiple protagonists, open world with a focus on both story and freedom.

name: World of Warcraft
rules: Create your character, complete quests, and engage in player-vs-environment and player-vs-player battles.
how_to_play: Join factions, raid dungeons, fight monsters, and engage in world-changing events in an online world.

additional_information.notable_features: Massive multiplayer world with extensive lore and character progression.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
rules: Play as a skilled samurai who must navigate dangerous lands and defeat formidable enemies.
how_to_play: Fight with precision, parry enemy strikes, and solve environmental puzzles to progress.

additional_information.notable_features: Challenging combat with a focus on timing and precision.

name: Final Fantasy XIV
rules: Create a character, explore the world of Eorzea, and participate in quests and battles.
how_to_play: Join a class, complete quests, engage in raids, and develop your character's skills.

additional_information.notable_features: Expansive world with deep storylines, raids, and a rich community.

name: The Binding of Isaac
rules: Navigate through randomly generated dungeons, fighting enemies and collecting power-ups.
how_to_play: Collect items, defeat enemies, and face challenging bosses in a dark, twisted world.

additional_information.notable_features: Rogue-like gameplay with randomly generated levels and items.

name: Borderlands 3
rules: Explore the planet Pandora, collect loot, and defeat enemies in a hybrid FPS and RPG world.
how_to_play: Complete missions, level up characters, and acquire weapons while shooting and looting.

additional_information.notable_features: RPG elements with comedic writing and intense shooting combat.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
rules: Play as a mercenary in ancient Greece, engage in combat, and explore a vast world.
how_to_play: Complete quests, build relationships, and fight in both large-scale battles and personal duels.

additional_information.notable_features: Immersive open-world with deep RPG elements and narrative choices.

name: Dark Souls III
rules: Fight through an unforgiving world filled with challenging enemies and bosses.
how_to_play: Master combat mechanics, level up, and defeat monstrous bosses to progress.

additional_information.notable_features: Challenging combat with deep lore and rich world-building.

name: Celeste
rules: Help Madeline climb the Celeste Mountain, overcoming challenges and personal trials.
how_to_play: Jump, dash, and solve platforming puzzles while exploring the mountain.

additional_information.notable_features: Challenging, precise platforming with a deeply emotional story.

name: Minecraft Dungeons
rules: Fight through procedurally generated dungeons, collecting loot and fighting enemies.
how_to_play: Choose your character, explore dungeons, and level up by defeating monsters.

additional_information.notable_features: Minecraft-inspired dungeon crawling with loot and teamwork.

name: No Man's Sky
rules: Explore planets, mine resources, and build structures while surviving in space.
how_to_play: Travel to different planets, collect resources, and build your intergalactic empire.

additional_information.notable_features: Procedurally generated universe with endless exploration.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
rules: Play as V, a mercenary in a dystopian future, completing missions and making choices that shape the world.
how_to_play: Complete missions, explore Night City, and engage in combat or dialogue with NPCs.

additional_information.notable_features: A massive, story-driven open-world game with a futuristic setting.

name: Journey
rules: Embark on a pilgrimage across vast desert landscapes, solving environmental puzzles along the way.
how_to_play: Explore the world, interact with other players, and uncover the game's mysteries.

additional_information.notable_features: Emotional storytelling with beautiful, minimalist design.

name: Tetris Effect
rules: Arrange falling blocks to complete lines and prevent the screen from filling up.
how_to_play: Rotate and position falling blocks to clear lines and score points.

additional_information.notable_features: Mesmerizing visuals and music with classic Tetris gameplay.

name: Hollow Knight
rules: Explore an underground world filled with monsters and secrets, solving puzzles and battling foes.
how_to_play: Upgrade your abilities, defeat bosses, and uncover the mysteries of Hallownest.

additional_information.notable_features: Challenging platforming with intricate world-building.

name: FIFA 21
rules: Compete in football matches, aiming to score goals while defending your team’s goal.
how_to_play: Choose your team, pass, shoot, and strategize to win matches against other players or AI.

additional_information.notable_features: Realistic football simulation with updated teams and leagues.

name: Call of Duty: Warzone
rules: Drop into a massive map, gather weapons and resources, and fight to be the last one standing.
how_to_play: Choose your squad, loot for resources, and engage in combat with other players.

additional_information.notable_features: Battle royale mode with team-based strategy.

name: Among Us
rules: Players are crewmates on a spaceship, but some are impostors who sabotage the mission.
how_to_play: Complete tasks on the spaceship while trying to figure out who the impostors are.

additional_information.notable_features: Social deduction gameplay where trust is key.

name: Rocket League
rules: Play soccer with rocket-powered cars, aiming to score goals in an arena.
how_to_play: Control cars, hit the ball to score goals, and use rocket boosts for fast maneuvers.

additional_information.notable_features: Unique blend of sports and action with customizable cars.

name: Overwatch
rules: Join teams of heroes with unique abilities and fight in objective-based game modes.
how_to_play: Use your hero’s unique abilities to complete objectives or defeat the enemy team.

additional_information.notable_features: Hero-based team shooter with various game modes.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
rules: Play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, as you explore a vast open world filled with quests.
how_to_play: Complete main story missions, side quests, and hunt monsters while making impactful choices.

additional_information.notable_features: Deep narrative choices with a massive open world.

name: Stardew Valley
rules: Farm, mine, and build relationships with people in a small town to create your dream life.
how_to_play: Plant crops, raise animals, mine resources, and complete tasks for the town’s residents.

additional_information.notable_features: Relaxing farming and life-simulation with strong community elements.

name: League of Legends
rules: Control a champion and work with your team to destroy the enemy's Nexus in a strategic battle.
how_to_play: Farm minions, level up your champion, and participate in strategic team fights.

additional_information.notable_features: Fast-paced, competitive team-based gameplay.

name: Minecraft
rules: Mine blocks, craft items, and build structures in a pixelated world.
how_to_play: Explore the world, mine resources, and craft tools to survive and build your creations.

additional_information.notable_features: Endless creativity with procedurally generated worlds.

name: Apex Legends
rules: Teams of players drop into a large arena and fight to be the last squad standing.
how_to_play: Use different characters with unique abilities, loot for weapons, and fight other teams.

additional_information.notable_features: Free-to-play battle royale with hero-based mechanics.

name: Valorant
rules: Compete in 5v5 tactical matches with agents possessing unique abilities.
how_to_play: Complete objectives such as planting or defusing bombs while utilizing agents' abilities.

additional_information.notable_features: Precision shooting combined with tactical abilities.

name: Destiny 2
rules: Take on the role of a Guardian and fight in a futuristic, sci-fi universe filled with powerful enemies.
how_to_play: Engage in PvE missions, participate in PvP battles, and level up your Guardian's abilities.

additional_information.notable_features: Futuristic shooter with MMO elements and co-op gameplay.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
rules: Engage in tactical military combat across various multiplayer modes.
how_to_play: Join teams and compete in fast-paced military combat, completing objectives in different modes.

additional_information.notable_features: Realistic military combat with diverse multiplayer modes.

name: Far Cry 5
rules: Explore a vast open-world Montana while battling a doomsday cult and liberating the region.
how_to_play: Complete story missions, take down cult leaders, and liberate the area through combat and strategy.

additional_information.notable_features: Open-world exploration with a deep narrative and action-packed gameplay.

name: Dota 2
rules: Teams of five heroes battle in strategic combat with the goal of destroying the enemy’s Ancient.
how_to_play: Choose a hero, level up, and coordinate with your team to destroy enemy structures.

additional_information.notable_features: Strategic team battles with a deep pool of heroes.

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
rules: Explore the world of Skyrim, level up your character, and engage in quests and combat.
how_to_play: Complete main and side quests, craft items, and develop your character’s abilities.

additional_information.notable_features: Epic fantasy RPG with vast world-building and exploration.

name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
rules: Build your dream island, interact with villagers, and partake in various activities like fishing, bug catching, and gardening.
how_to_play: Design your island, complete tasks for villagers, and enjoy a peaceful, relaxing life.

additional_information.notable_features: Relaxing, open-ended simulation with a focus on community-building.

name: Dead by Daylight
rules: One player controls a killer while others must escape without being caught or killed.
how_to_play: As a survivor, cooperate with others to escape the map while avoiding the killer. As a killer, hunt and capture the survivors.

additional_information.notable_features: Horror-themed multiplayer with intense gameplay and killer survivor mechanics.

name: Spelunky 2
rules: Explore dangerous caves filled with treasures, traps, and enemies while trying to survive.
how_to_play: Jump, dodge, and fight enemies while navigating challenging levels filled with hazards.

additional_information.notable_features: Challenging platforming with randomly generated levels and permadeath.
